actions.text: On agreeing to the Callahan amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment increases by $50 million the funding for gross obligations for loans to section 502 borrowers; increases by $10.4 million the cost of direct and guaranteed loans including the cost of modifying loans; and offsets that increase by reducing funds for the Rural Housing and Community Development Service.
purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the Rural House Insurance fund by approximately $10 million.
